description: '''Linda Bell Viera Caballero''' (born March 9, 1969), known professionally as '''La India''', is a [[Puerto Ricans|Puerto Rican]] singer and songwriter of [[Salsa music|salsa]], [[House music|house]] music and [[Latin pop]]. La India has been nominated for both [[Grammy Award|Grammy]] and [[Latin Grammy Award]]s, winning the [[Latin Grammy Award for Best Salsa Album]] for the ''Intensamente La India Con Canciones De Juan Gabriel'' album.
